speaker: Agent
text: NovaNet customer care, Sandeep speaking. How may I assist?

speaker: Customer
text: I need to cancel my service. I’m leaving the country next week.

speaker: Agent
text: I can help with that. I’ll verify your account first—name, service address, and registered phone number?

speaker: Customer
text: Name is Ayesha Khan. Address is 5, Coral Enclave, Hyderabad. Phone number 97xxxx1190.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Ayesha. Pulling up your account now…

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, I see Fiber 500, and you’re on a 12-month agreement that started September 20. That means there’s an early termination fee if you cancel before the term ends.

speaker: Customer
text: No. I didn’t sign up for any fee. I’m moving for work, this is not optional.

speaker: Agent
text: I hear you. The agreement is usually accepted digitally during signup, sometimes with a discounted installation or promo credit. I’m not saying you remember it—most people don’t—but it is on the account. The early termination fee right now is _2,500.

speaker: Customer
text: That’s ridiculous. I’m not paying that.

speaker: Agent
text: Understood. Let’s see what we can do. We have a policy for relocation: if you’re moving to an address where NovaNet is not serviceable, we can request a waiver of the termination fee. If you’re moving abroad, that typically qualifies, but we need documentation—like travel itinerary or visa/work letter.

speaker: Customer
text: I can email my flight ticket.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect. I’ll create a relocation-cancellation case and attach your proof once you send it. While we’re here, do you want the service to end on a specific date? You said next week—what date are you leaving?

speaker: Customer
text: February 10.

speaker: Agent
text: Okay. I can schedule cancellation effective February 9 end-of-day so you have service through packing chaos. Or February 10 morning. Most customers prefer end-of-day the day before travel.

speaker: Customer
text: End of day Feb 9.

speaker: Agent
text: Done. Now equipment: you have an ONT and a router on lease. Those must be returned within 7 days of cancellation to avoid non-return fees. If you’re leaving the country, we can schedule a pickup before you go.

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, pickup before I leave.

speaker: Agent
text: Got it. I’ll schedule pickup for February 7 or 8. Let me check slot availability—one moment.

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks, checking now…

speaker: Agent
text: I have Saturday February 7, 11 AM to 2 PM, or Sunday February 8, 2 PM to 6 PM.

speaker: Customer
text: Saturday.

speaker: Agent
text: Booked for February 7, 11 to 2. You’ll get SMS confirmation. Now, about the termination fee: I’m opening case REL-663901. Once we get your flight ticket, we submit to the waiver team. Decision is usually within 2 business days.

speaker: Customer
text: Where do I send it?

speaker: Agent
text: I’ll send you an SMS with a secure upload link tied to your case. You can upload the PDF or screenshot. Please ensure your name and travel date are visible.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay. And billing?

speaker: Agent
text: Final billing: you’ll get a last statement within 48 hours after Feb 9. It will include charges up to Feb 9, plus any remaining device charges if applicable. If the waiver is approved, the termination fee line will be credited or removed.

speaker: Customer
text: And if it’s not approved?

speaker: Agent
text: Then the early termination fee remains. At that point you can appeal once, especially if the documentation clearly shows relocation outside service area. Since you’re leaving the country, approval rates are pretty high—assuming the ticket matches the account holder name.

speaker: Customer
text: It does.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect. I’m also noting that you requested cancellation due to international relocation for work. That context matters.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay.

speaker: Agent
text: Recap: cancellation scheduled for February 9 end-of-day, equipment pickup booked February 7 11 AM–2 PM, relocation waiver case REL-663901 created, upload link will be sent to your phone. Anything else?

speaker: Customer
text: No.

speaker: Agent
text: Safe travels, Ayesha. Thanks for calling NovaNet.
